doc.title: Fridays For Future - Take Action: why and how
doc.excerpt: Millions are taking action to save the climate, and more are needed. Here is why and how.

main.p: The earth is warming and people and animals are already dying from floods, drought and storms.
Brave people all over the world are standing up to protect the world we love, our only home in the universe.
No one is too small to make a difference.
Join us and strike for your own future.
One of the most powerful things you can do to as a citizen is to take civil action.
Find out what is going on in the movement. Important dates for climate strikers.
FFF Logo, chants, inspirational strike videos and more.
Connect with climate activists all over the world.
Stay updated with what is going on in the movement!
